cont.entity_a: Excellent sound quality with clear highs, mids, and bass. Warm and natural sound, especially good for acoustic music. Soundstage is well-defined but not very large.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is good but can be affected by obstructions. Optical input provides clean sound. Background hiss can be present.

cont.entity_a: Very comfortable for long listening sessions. Tight fit initially, but comfort improves over time.
Open-back design does not provide noise cancellation. Not suitable for noisy environments due to sound leakage.
cont.entity_b: Charging dock design is difficult to use.

cont.entity_a: Requires a proper amp and DAC for optimal performance.
cont.entity_b: Limited range from the base. Volume control is difficult to use.

cont.entity_a: Some users experience issues with cable connection and durability.
cont.entity_b: Some users experience static and poor reception.

cont.entity_a: Good value for money compared to higher-priced models.

cont.entity_b: Good for watching TV without disturbing others.
